com.twofortyfouram.spackle

Class ThreadUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twofortyfouram.spackle.ThreadUtil

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class ThreadUtil
extends Object
    Provides Android-specific thread management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ThreadUtil.ThreadPriority
      Rich enum for the Android thread priority levels.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static HandlerThread newHandlerThread(String threadName, ThreadUtil.ThreadPriority threadPriority)
      Obtains a new, started HandlerThread.

    • Method Detail

      • isMainThread

        public static boolean isMainThread()
        Returns:
        True if the current thread is the main application thread.

      • newHandlerThread

        public static HandlerThread newHandlerThread(String threadName,
                                             ThreadUtil.ThreadPriority threadPriority)
        Obtains a new, started HandlerThread.
        Parameters:
        threadName - Name of the thread.
        threadPriority - Priority of the thread. Must be one of the priority constants defined in Process.
        Returns:
        a HandlerThread with the given threadName and threadPriority, whose Thread.start() method has already been called.
